ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_01: I take it you defeated the guard out front.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_02:
That base is run by Team Star’s Fighting crew—
the Caph Squad.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_03:
Their boss, Eri, is a skilled wrestler and coaches
the whole of Team Star in Pokémon battling.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_04:
Of all the bosses, she’ll likely be the most alert
to hostilities after our declaration of war.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_05:
She might try to stop this raid in its tracks by
challenging you to battle before anyone else.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_06: I knew it! Tell me what happened![VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_07:
She...retreated?! We’re talking about the same
Eri, right?[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_08:
Well...it seems there’s nothing for it now but to
attack the base head on.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_kakutou_020_cassiopeia_10:
Ring the bell on the gates once you’re ready to
kick off this phase of the operation.\c
Time to wipe the Caph Squad off the map![VAR 0114(0009)]
